title: 08/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin celebrates Tom Brady's 44th birthday by admiring everything he has accomplished in his career and what makes him different from any other QB in NFL history. He advocates for the Colts to pursue Nick Foles as a replacement for the injured Carson Wentz and why they need to capitalize on their Super Bowl window right now. He tells you which teams in the NBA got better in free agency and which got worse. Plus, Chargers QB Justin Herbert joins the show to talk about his stellar rookie season and what will be different this season under new head coach Brandon Staley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
